title: Language Proficiency Enhancement through Game-Based Informal Music Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and foundational music theory knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners experience music game apps on personal mobile devices, performing activities that integrate music learning and language acquisition through gamification elements.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three music theory concepts (harmony, rhythm, scales) using a music game app
Learners can complete at least one music creation project through collaboration with peer learners in a game-based learning environment
Learners can perform at least two language-based expressions of musical activities (writing reflections, reviews) based on informal learning experiences

resources: Mobile Music Game Apps (Beat Saber, BeatDrop, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
